basics.name: Derek Johnston
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Well organized, creative, and a proven professional software developer.  Experience working with remote and local development teams.  Long term interests in computers, initially sparked by my mother working in a computer repair shop, where I attended a summer boot camp as a child. Interests furthered then by my father working as a Bell 2.5 level support technician.
